goal.en: To develop the capabilities and skills as an ERP implementation consultant through Lecture, Discussion, Presentation, and experience sharing by field experts,
goal.ch: 藉由授課, 討論, 分組報告, 業界專家經驗分享等方式, 幫助同學學習並培養ERP顧問需具備的技能

content.en:
Week Topic
1 (2/19) Course Introduction, SAP Introduction
2 (2/26) ERP Financial and Logistic modules walkthrough
3 (3/4) Why ERP
4 (3/11) ERP Implementation Approach
5 (3/18) To Be Busimess Processes Design
6 (3/25) Business Blueprint Design
7 (4/1) ERP Solution Plan
8 (4/8) Mid-term Report Presentation
9 (4/15) System Build (function configuration, coding and unit test)
10 (4/22) System Integration Test / User Acceptance Test
11 (4/29) Data Preparation and Conversion
12 (5/6) Change Management and End Unser Training
13 (5/13) Deployment and Post Production Support
14 (5/20) Project Management
15 (5/27) ERP Project Quality Assurance
16 (6/3) Final Report Presentation
17 (6/10) Dragon Boat Festival Holiday
18 (6/17) ERP Case Study
